### [Computing environment](/course-support.html) {{< fa bullhorn >}}

{{< fa database >}} We use the PostGreSQL server from UFR de Mathématiques. To obtain an ENT account  {{< fa user-secret >}} follow procedure  [Moodle](https://moodle.u-paris.fr/course/view.php?id=2313)

- [`pgcli`](https://www.pgcli.com)
